Count me in as an Interested person

This is another message sent by the infamous Ricky Der, The Legendary Light.

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Paul Hightower [mailto:dph_of_rules@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 06, 2001 11:03 AM
To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [gladiator] Wish List Part 1


**Tournament Related**
Until at least 15 people show interest in participating in a
tournamanet, I will stop discussing tournament related issues.  Why
15?  To make the effort somewhat worthwhile.  It will take several
hours of work to get ready for the tournament (selecting
scenarios and editing them/making new scenarios).  If any of my
scenarios are to be used, they will have to edited to bring experience
level of opponents and number of opponents down.

**What's going on with Part 1?  What about the rest?**
This is going to be a four part discussion.  Part 1 is about the wish
list for a NEW scenario editor for gladiator.  Part 2 will be about a
wish list for existing characters.  Part 3 will be about a wish list
for new characters and misc stuff.  Part 4 will be about the wish list
for Gladiator:Beyond Freedom, which I believe no person in this list
has played.

I will ask replies to this topic be restricted to improvements for a
new scenario editor.  When I feel this topic is exhausted, I will
compile a list for a new scenario editor and start Part 2.

Here's the first one:  Slow down feature for the mouse.  In a big
scenario, it's too easy to move your mouse completely off screen from
the area you are working on.  Telvido, I expect you to have as many
suggestions about the scenario editor as I have.


The Gladiator Mailing List


Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
